entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
